testcase.name: Accessibility › homepage should be accessible
Accessibility › article page should be accessible
Accessibility › should have proper heading hierarchy
Accessibility › should have alt text for images
Accessibility › should be keyboard navigable
Accessibility › should activate links with Enter key
Accessibility › should have sufficient color contrast
Accessibility › should have proper ARIA landmarks
Accessibility › should have proper link text
Accessibility › should have skip navigation link
Accessibility › should have proper page title
Accessibility › should have language attribute
Accessibility › should support text zoom
Accessibility › should have proper form labels if forms exist
Homepage › should load successfully
Homepage › should display navigation menu
Homepage › should display recent articles
Homepage › should have working sitemap link
Homepage › should have proper HTML structure
Homepage › should have SEO meta tags
Multi-Language Support › should load English version
Multi-Language Support › should load German version
Multi-Language Support › should load French version
Multi-Language Support › should load Spanish version
Multi-Language Support › should switch between languages
Multi-Language Support › should have consistent structure across languages
Multi-Language Support › should have language-specific meta tags
Multi-Language Support › should maintain navigation in selected language
Multi-Language Support › should have proper charset encoding for all languages
Multi-Language Support › should display articles in language-specific format
Multi-Language Support › should have correct language in alternate links
Navigation › should have functional navigation menu
Navigation › should navigate to different sections
Navigation › should maintain navigation state across pages
Navigation › should have working home link
Navigation › should support browser back button
Navigation › should support browser forward button
Navigation › should have accessible skip links
Navigation › should have proper link focus states
Navigation › should have working external links
Navigation › should not have broken internal links
News Browsing › should open and display article
News Browsing › should navigate back to homepage
News Browsing › should display article metadata
News Browsing › should have working internal links
News Browsing › should display article content
Responsive Design › should render correctly on Mobile Portrait
Responsive Design › should render correctly on Tablet Portrait
Responsive Design › should render correctly on Desktop
Responsive Design › should have responsive meta viewport tag
Responsive Design › should adapt layout for different screen sizes
Responsive Design › should have touch-friendly tap targets on mobile
Responsive Design › should not have horizontal scroll on mobile
Responsive Design › should display readable text on mobile
Responsive Design › should stack content on mobile
Responsive Design › should maintain functionality across viewports
Responsive Design › should have responsive images
Responsive Design › should hide or show elements based on viewport
Responsive Design › should support landscape orientation on mobile
Responsive Design › should have readable line lengths on desktop
Responsive Design › should support text resizing without breaking layout
